sentence.Network_en: The bequest is con-servatively estimated at £30 million.
sentence.Network_cn: 保守估计，这笔遗产有3,000万英镑。

sentence.Network_en: He left a bequest to each of his grandchildren.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给他的孙辈每人留下一笔遗产。

sentence.Network_en: In his will he made a substantial bequest to his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 在遗嘱里他给妻子留下了一大笔遗产.

GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... bequeath v． 遗赠（留） bequest n． 遗产，遗赠物 berate v． 猛烈责骂.
BEC中级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... blackball a. 反对票 bequest n. 遗产；遗物 berth n. 泊位，锚位；卧铺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from be- 'about' + Old English  cwis 'speech', influenced by bequeath

entry.def: A bequest is money or property which you legally leave to someone when you die.

example.ex: The church here was left a bequest to hire doctors who would work amongst the poor.
example.tran: 这个教堂接收到一笔遗产，可以用来聘请医生为穷人治病。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) a gift of personal property by will

auth_sentence.content: The Family The press surrounding Lu's bequest flushed out her next of kin.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Family The press surrounding Lu's bequest flushed out her next of kin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Family The press surrounding Lu's bequest flushed out her next of kin.

auth_sentence.content: No estate tax is incurred on the bequest itself, and the rest of the estate will be placed in a lower tax bracket.
auth_sentence.res_content: No estate tax is incurred on the bequest itself, and the rest of the estate will be placed in a lower tax bracket.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No estate tax is incurred on the bequest itself, and the rest of the estate will be placed in a lower tax bracket.

auth_sentence.content: The twelve-million-dollar trust for the dog is bigger than any other single bequest in the will.
auth_sentence.res_content: The twelve-million-dollar trust for the dog is bigger than any other single bequest in the will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The twelve-million-dollar trust for the dog is bigger than any other single bequest in the will.

sentences.en: The library has received a generous bequest from a local businessman.
sentences.cn: 图书馆从当地一位商人那里得到了一大笔遗赠。

sentences.en: The picture was acquired by bequest in 1921.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是在1921年通过遗赠获得的。

sentences.en: He received a bequest under his grandmother’s will.
sentences.cn: 他得到他祖母遗嘱项下的遗赠。

sentences.en: In his will he made a substantial bequest to his wife.
sentences.cn: 在遗嘱里他给妻子留下了一大笔遗产。
